title: Renovated 1BR Apartment in the Heart of Telegraph Hill!
posting_body: Structure Properties is pleased to offer this one bedroom (office could be used as a 2BD) centrally located in Telegraph Hill, blocks away from Washington Square Park.
Relaxing afternoons in the Park as well as endless dining and entertainment options are all literally just steps away from your front door!
This apartment boasts white oak hardwood floors, high ceilings and crown molding.
The kitchen features stainless steel appliances including a gas stove/range and dishwasher, plenty of storage and a dining nook.
This residential neighborhood is a prime location, being both relaxed and bustling; easily within walking distance to anything and everything!
-2 minute walk to restaurants and entertainment
-5 minute walk from the corporate shuttle bus stop
-7 minute walk to Washington Square Park
Pets Allowed with Deposit of $300/Cat and $500/Dog
Monthly income of 2.5x the amount of rent

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
